name: Goals
definition: Number of goals credited to a player in a single game.
formula_pseudocode: count(events where event_type='shot' and event_detail_1='goal' and player is event_player_1)
notes: Basic counting stat; also aggregated to season/team levels.

name: Assists
definition: Number of assists credited to a player in a game.
formula_pseudocode: count(goal_events where player appears in assist roles in play_details columns)
notes: Depends on how assist roles are encoded in event/play detail columns.

name: Controlled Zone Entries
definition: Number of offensive zone entries with control by a player.
formula_pseudocode: count(events where event_type='zone_entry' and event_detail_1='controlled' and player is event_player_1)
notes: Can also compute team and line level versions.

name: Controlled Entries with Shot
definition: Number of controlled offensive zone entries that lead to a shot within a short time window.
formula_pseudocode: for each controlled zone_entry, look ahead N seconds / events for a shot by same team; count such entries
notes: Requires sequence or event-chain table to detect follow-up shots.

name: Expected Goals per Shot
definition: Model-estimated probability that a given shot becomes a goal.
notes: Stored as a column in fact_xg_shots; aggregated to players/teams.

name: xG For per 60
definition: Expected goals for a player while on ice, scaled to 60 minutes.
notes: Requires joining on-ice players from shifts to shots/xG events.

name: Corsi For
definition: All shot attempts (on goal, missed, blocked) by the playerâ€™s team while they are on the ice.
formula_pseudocode: count(shot_attempt_events for team_for where player is among on-ice players from shifts)
notes: Computed at on-ice level; also available at team/line levels.

name: Corsi Against
definition: All shot attempts by the opposing team while the player is on the ice.
formula_pseudocode: count(shot_attempt_events for team_against where player is among on-ice players)
notes: Standard Corsi definition; can also compute differential and %.

name: Rating Context on Zone Entry
definition: Summary of player ratings for both teams on ice at time of a zone entry.
formula_pseudocode: for event zone_entry, join to shifts_on_ice, then aggregate ratings: min/max/avg per team
notes: Used to study how low/high-rated players handle tough matchups.

name: Rush Goal Sequence Flag
definition: Flag for sequences where a team moves quickly from DZ/NZ into OZ and scores within a short window.
formula_pseudocode: sequence where zone_entry in OZ followed by goal event within N seconds/events and preceding events show transition from DZ/NZ
notes: Useful for studying rush offense efficiency.
